# LogLevel enumeration

Contains values that specify log verbosity.

```csharp
public enum LogLevel
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0` | None |
| Fatal | `1` | Fatal |
| Error | `2` | Error |
| Warn | `3` | Warning |
| Info | `4` | Information |
| Debug | `5` | Debug |
| All | `6` | All |
